title: Ornn mission never appeared for me.
body:
Just as title says it, i've got none Ornn related missions, my Missions tab is blank, completed mission also show no related mentions. If i understand correctly from this page http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/ornn-and-exclusive-forgemaster-icon-available-now it is not required to own Ornn to complete at least part of the mission and i've faced Ornn multiple times in matchmade games. 
Side note here: from what i can gather, my friends also haven't got these missions, because usually completing [other] mission comes up in conversations over VoIP when we are playing League together.
EUW server.
Is this a bug or maybe i am in the wrong here?
Thanks.

replies.body: Similar to Kayn, you'll need to own the champion to obtain the mission.  The mission will be available to everyone, though, when he becomes free during the free champion rotation shortly after release.  Hang on for when he is free for the week, and you should be able to do them then!

Is this still true? Because [the free champion rotation until 9/11](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/new-free-champion-rotation-bard-lucian-xerath-and-more) does not include Ornn, and according to [your news release](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/ornn-and-exclusive-forgemaster-icon-available-now), the mission will end on the 10th. {{champion:516}}
